content.question: Which of the following best describes the hydrolysis of carbohydrates?

choices.label: The removal of a water molecule breaks a covalent bond between sugar monomers.
The removal of a water molecule forms a covalent bond between sugar monomers.
The addition of a water molecule breaks a covalent bond between sugar monomers.
The addition of a water molecule forms a covalent bond between sugar monomers.

content.answer: The addition of a water molecule breaks a covalent bond between sugar monomers.
